name: Identify The Movie By Characters Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies | 25 Questions

questions.text: Craig Schwartz, Maxine, John Horatio Malkovich.
questions.explanation:
Being John Malkovich.

	Starring John Cusack, Cameron Diaz, Catherine Keener, and, of course, John Malkovich.

questions.text: Oz Oseransky, Jimmy Tudeski, Jill St. Claire.
questions.explanation:
The Whole Nine Yards.

	Starring Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Natasha Henstridge, Rosanna Arquette, Amanda Peet, and Michael Clarke Duncan.

questions.text: Andie Walsh, Blane McDonough, Ducky.
questions.explanation:
Pretty In Pink.

	Starring Molly Ringwald, Andrew McCarthy, Jon Cryer, Harry Dean Stanton, Annie Potts, and James Spader.

questions.text: Schatze Page, Loco Dempsey, Pola Debevoise.
questions.explanation:
How To Marry A Millionaire.

	Starring Marilyn Monroe, Lauren Bacall, Betty Grable, and Cameron Mitchell.

questions.text: Gabey, Chip, Ozzie.
questions.explanation:
On The Town.

	Starring Gene Kelly, Frank Sinatra, Jules Munshin, Betty Garrett, Ann Miller, and Vera-Ellen.

questions.text: Holden McNeil, Alyssa Jones, Banky Edwards.
questions.explanation:
Chasing Amy.

	Starring Ben Affleck, Joey Lauren Adams, Jason Lee, and Dwight Ewell.

questions.text: Harry Burns, Sally Albright, Marie.
questions.correct: When Harry Met Sally... & When Harry Met Sally
questions.explanation:
When Harry Met Sally... & When Harry Met Sally

	Starring Billy Crystal, Meg Ryan, Carrie Fisher, and Bruno Kirby.

questions.text: Holly Golightly, Paul Varjak, Mr. Yunioshi.
questions.correct: Breakfast At Tiffany's & Breakfast at Tiffanys
questions.explanation:
Breakfast At Tiffany's & Breakfast at Tiffanys.

	Starring Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, and Mickey Rooney.

questions.text: Peter Mitchell, Jack Holden, Michael Kellam.
questions.explanation:
Three Men And A Baby.

	Starring Tom Selleck, Ted Danson, and Steve Guttenberg.

questions.text: Kathryn Merteuil, Sebastian Valmont, Annette Hargrove.
questions.explanation:
Cruel Intentions.

	Starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Reese Witherspoon, Selma Blair, and Sean Patrick Thomas.

questions.text: Judah Ben-Hur, Quintus Arrius, Messala.
questions.explanation:
Ben-Hur & Ben Hur.

	Starring Charlton Heston, Stephen Boyd, Haya Harareet, and Jack Hawkins.

questions.text: Don Lockwood, Kathy Selden, Cosmo Brown.
questions.explanation:
Singin' In The Rain.

	Starring Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds, and Jean Hagen.

questions.text: Humbert Humbert, Dolores Haze, Clare Quilty.
questions.explanation:
Lolita.

	Starring Jeremy Irons, Dominique Swain, Melanie Griffith, and Frank Langella. The original 1962 version starred James Mason, Shelley Winters, Sue Lyon, and Peter Sellers.

questions.text: Julianne Potter, Michael O'Neal, Kimmy Wallace.
questions.correct: My Best Friend's Wedding & My Best Friends Wedding
questions.explanation:
My Best Friend's Wedding & My Best Friends Wedding.

	Starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz, and Rupert Everett.

questions.text: Andy Dufresne, Brooks Hatlen, Ellis 'Red' Redding.
questions.explanation:
The Shawshank Redemption & Shawshank Redemption.

	Starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, James Whitmore, and William Sadler.

questions.text: Satine, Christian, Toulouse.
questions.explanation:
Moulin Rouge & Moulin Rouge!.

	Starring Nicole Kidman, Ewan McGregor, and John Leguizamo.

questions.text: Sabrina Fairchild, David Larrabee, Linus Larrabee.
questions.explanation:
Sabrina.

	Starring Audrey Hepburn, Humphrey Bogart, and William Holden. There is also a 1995 remake starring Harrison Ford, Greg Kinnear, and Julia Ormond.

questions.text: Vianne Rocher, Roux, Josephine Muscat.
questions.explanation:
Chocolat.

	Starring Juliette Binoche, Johnny Depp, Lena Olin, and Judi Dench.

questions.text: Marquise De Merteuil, Vimcomte De Valmont, Madame de Tourvel.
questions.explanation:
Dangerous Liaisons.

	Starring Glenn Close, John Malkovich, Michelle Pfeiffer, Uma Thurman, and Keanu Reeves.

questions.text: Brodie Bruce, T.S. Quint, Rene Mosier.
questions.explanation:
Mallrats.

	Starring Jason Lee, Jeremy London, Shannen Doherty, Claire Forlani, Ben Affleck, Jason Mewes, Kevin Smith, and Joey Lauren Adams.

questions.text: Westley, Buttercup, Inigo Montoya.
questions.explanation:
The Princess Bride & Princess Bride.

	Starring Cary Elwes, Robin Wright, Mandy Patinkin, and Chris Sarandon.

questions.text: Tommy Albright, Jeff Douglas, Fiona Campbell.
questions.explanation:
Brigadoon.

	Starring Gene Kelly, Cyd Charisse, and Van Johnson.

questions.text: Verena Von Stefan, Odette Sinclair, Tinka Parker.
questions.correct: Strike! & Strike & All I Wanna Do & The Hairy Bird
questions.explanation:
Strike! & Strike & All I Wanna Do & The Hairy Bird.

	Starring Kirsten Dunst, Gaby Hoffman, Monica Keena, and Lynn Redgrave.

questions.text: Allen Bauer, Madison, Walter Kornbluth.
questions.explanation:
Splash.

	Starring Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah, Eugene Levy, and John Candy.

questions.text: Mitch Robbins, Phil Berquist, Curly.
questions.explanation: City Slickers.
